name: Ball Shooter
description:
Ball Shooter is a small game, where you shoot bullets to defeat enemies. You can play infinite mode, where monsters spawn slowly at first, but then they start to spawn faster. And they get faster too. A timer shows how long you have been alive. You can try to beat your own score.

You can also play custom levels made in the game. There you can beat challenges and fight a boss at the end.

Can you beat all the levels? How long can you survive?
